name: brid
body: |- wb(wbr(c0, cid, c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))

stmt.origin: bitr3i(wbr(c0, cid, c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0), wbr(c0, ccnv(cid), c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cid, c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))
-| wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(cid), c1), wbr(c0, cid, c1))
-| wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(cid), c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cid, c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))
-| wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(cid), c1), wbr(c0, cid, c1))
-| wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(cid), c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(cid), c1), wbr(c0, cid, c1))
-| wceq(ccnv(cid), cid)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cid, c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))
-| wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(cid), c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))
-| wceq(ccnv(cid), cid)

|- wb(wbr(c0, cid, c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))
-| wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(cid), c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(cid), c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))
-| wrel(cid)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cid, c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))
-| wrel(cid)
|- wb(wbr(c0, cid, c1), wbr(c1, cid, c0))

comment: Property of the identity binary relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 18-Dec-2021.)
